resume_text:
Mayur Kailas Shirsat  
Pune, Maharashtra 411023 | 9067611982 |  mayurshirsat1999@gmail.com | LinkedIn: mayur -shirsat -422757151  
 
EDUCATION  
SYMBIOSIS INTERNATIONAL UNIVERSITY  Pune, Maharashtra  
Master of Science Data Science and Spatial Analytics     July 2023 – July 2025  
 
BHARATI VIDYAPEETH DEEMED UNIVERSITY  Pune, Maharashtra  
Bachelors of Science Computer Science          July 2017 – November 2020
 
SKILLS AND STRENGTHS  
AI & ML Expertise: Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Image Processing, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Generative AI , Deep Learning  
Database & Data Management: SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle), NoSQL (MongoDB), RDBMS, Data Quality & Governance . 
Languages & Libraries: Python (NumPy, Pandas, PySpark, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Scikit -learn, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, OpenCV, Selenium), R, C, C++, 
HTML, CSS.  
Data Analytics:  Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), Data Cleaning, Data Wrangling, Data Manipulation, Statistical Analysis, Data Modeling, Predi ctive 
Analytics, Data Visualization, Web Scraping.  
Tools & Platforms:  Power BI, MS Excel, Microsoft Azure, Linux, Agile, Dashboard Design , Roboflow, n8n.  
Soft Skills:  Strong Reasoning, Decision Making, Insight translation and reporting , Team Collaboration, Computer Literacy.  
 
WORK EXPERIENCE  
AI ML Engineer  at Rajyug Solutions                                                                                                                                                                                   July 2025 – Present  
• Designed multi -agent AI analytics systems and developed ML/DL solutions for OCR, computer vision, object detection, and behavioral analytics  using 
CNNs, LSTMs, and ensemble methods , used n8n for creating AI agents . 
• Trained and deployed deep learning models with Roboflow pipelines, TensorFlow, and Scikit -learn, improving recognition and detection accuracy across 
diverse datasets.  
• Built RAG -based conversational AI chatbots, delivered through FastAPI endpoints and integrated into Streamlit interfaces for interactiv e, user -friendly 
experiences.  
 
Data Science and AI intern at Canspirit.ai                                                                                                                                       May 2024 – November  2024  
• Developed and deployed websites and AI/ML projects using Docker, TensorFlow, and Google Cloud, improving system efficiency by  30%.  
• Automated lead generation processes with LLMs and Machine Learning, increasing lead acquisition by 25%  and Enhanced webpage SEO with LLMs and 
AI agents, boosting visibility and user engagement by 40%.    
• Delivered technical projects, showcasing expertise in cutting -edge AI tools and frameworks  
 
PROJECTS  
• Executive Dashboard for Project Performance Analysis :  
▪ Built a Power BI dashboard using SQL to assess project performance across departments, roles, and audiences. Delivered insigh ts on revenue by 
project category, roles, and audience, identifying corporate projects as top contributors ($510.75M).  
▪ Optimized departmental analysis, highlighting international projects as the highest earners ($159.06M). Published on GitHub t o foster collaborative 
feedback and data -driven decisions.  
• RAG -Based Document Information Extraction System:   
▪ Retrieval -Augmented Generation (RAG) system using Meta LLaMA to extract and summarize data from 5+ document types, including links, DOC , PDF, 
CSV, and text files  and integrated it with NetworkX for Knowledge Graph based RAG.  
▪ With  90% accuracy rate in multi -format data retrieval, enhancing document analysis by 40%. Optimized query handling to support complex 
information requests, improving data accessibility for users by 35%.  
• OpenCV Object Detection System:   
▪ Created a real -time object detection and classification system using OpenCV. Achieved an 85% detection accuracy with an average confidence l evel 
of 60% on live video streams by refining the model’s architecture.  
▪ Integrated advanced techniques to improve detection performance, enabling diverse applications in computer vision tasks.  
• Bank Customer Churn Prediction Model:   
▪ Designed and implemented a predictive model to assess customer churn in the banking industry. Utilized machine learning algor ithms, including 
Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost, to fine -tune the model.  
▪ Achieved an 85% accuracy rate by optimizing hyperparameters and employing techniques such as feature engineering and cross -validation. Analyzed 
customer behavior and key factors influencing churn, providing valuable insights to enhance retention strategies  
 
CERTIFICATION  AND ACHIEVEMENTS  
ISRO AI/ML for Geodata analysis in August 2024  | Python certification from Infosys springboard in October 2023  |Prompt Engineering by Great learning
